5.1.1 Misc #

@fontFamily 'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, serif

5.1.2 Swatches #

Example
@swatchBody
@swatchFont
@swatchRed
@swatchBlue
<div class="lay lay--fixed lay--center lay--s style_layout-example">
	<div style="background-color: #f2f2f2">@swatchBody</div>
	<div style="background-color: #666666">@swatchFont</div>
	<div style="background-color: #ff6666">@swatchRed</div>
	<div style="background-color: #6666ff">@swatchBlue</div>
</div>
